notes.title: 👋 Welcome!
notes.text:
Welcome to Astro Notes! I hope you enjoy using this latest creation. Happy note-taking!

-laszlo-ratesic

notes.title: 🧰 Get Started
notes.text:
To get started, go ahead and hit the + icon in the top right corner to empty the current note field.

Be sure to enter a title for your note and some text into the body.

Once you're satisfied with the results, you can press the floppy disk icon to save the note, and that's it!

Go ahead and give it a try!

-laszlo-ratesic

notes.title: 🗑️ Deleting Notes
notes.text:
To delete a note, press the trash can icon next to the note's title in the list of saved notes. 

Feel free to delete these boilerplate note guides to make room for your own!

-laszlo-ratesic
